text:
options:
# Scoreboard
    Title: &a    &8 &eMangos   &7
	
# The lines, you can use %{rank.%loop-player%}% for the users group, %balance of loop-player% for their balance, and %player% for their name.
every second:
    loop all players:
        wipe loop-player's sidebar
        set name of sidebar of loop-player to "&e&lMANGOS"
        set score "&b" in sidebar of loop-player to 9
        set score "&8 &7Rank: &c%{rank.%loop-player%}%" in sidebar of loop-player to 8
        set score "&8 &7Name: &c%loop-player%" in sidebar of loop-player to 7
        set score "&d" in sidebar of loop-player to 6
        set score "&8 &7Balance: &c%balance of loop-player%" in sidebar of loop-player to 5
        set score "&0" in sidebar of loop-player to 4
        set score "&8 &7Staff Online:: &c???" in sidebar of loop-player to 3
        set score "&6" in sidebar of loop-player to 2
        set score "&8 &eMangos.minehut.gg" in sidebar of loop-player to 1
